name: ecommerce-product-page-main
description: ![Design preview for the E-commerce product page coding challenge](./design/desktop-preview.jpg)

scripts.install: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.server: npm run preserve --prefix server && npm run serve --prefix server
scripts.watch: npm run server & npm run client
scripts.deploy: npm run install-client && npm run build --prefix client && npm run prestart --prefix server && npm run start --prefix server
scripts.deploy-cluster: npm run install-client && npm run build --prefix client && npm run prestart --prefix server && npm run cluster --prefix server
